name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】1st generation Princess Party♪♪【#ホロ1期生6周年】 [fWXjydrUZo8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Opening MC segment where the Hololive 1st Generation members discuss their 6th anniversary, the stage concept, and their goals for the 7th year.
Performance of the song 'Prinyan Mode is Pipipi no Pi' by Shirakami Fubuki.
scenes.song_name: Prinyan Mode is Pipipi no Pi

subtitles.original: 6周年！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: 6th Anniversary! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ついに我々、6周年でございます。
subtitles.english: Finally, we have reached our 6th anniversary.

subtitles.original: すごいねー。
subtitles.english: It's amazing.

subtitles.original: 今回、6周年記念ライブのコンセプトが、
subtitles.english: The concept of this 6th anniversary commemorative live is,

subtitles.original: みんなお姫様ということで、はい。
subtitles.english: everyone as a princess, yes.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、1曲目「お姫様にしてよ！」から歌わせていただきました！
subtitles.english: So, we started off by singing "Make Me a Princess!" as our first song!

subtitles.original: ちょっと今回、なんとステージも、1期生のライブ仕様になりました！
subtitles.english: This time, incredibly, the stage is also customized for the 1st Generation's live!

subtitles.original: 可愛い！すごい！
subtitles.english: So cute! Amazing!

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ豪華じゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it incredibly luxurious?

subtitles.original: 我々の城、みんなで建てた城ですよ！
subtitles.english: It's our castle, the castle we all built together!

subtitles.original: みんなのおかげで、こんな立派な城が建ちました！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thanks to everyone, such a magnificent castle has been built! Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: そしてですね、上の方、実は時計があるんですが、
subtitles.english: And, you see, up there, there's actually a clock,

subtitles.original: この時計、12時と見せかけて、実は23時59分で止まってます！
subtitles.english: but although it looks like 12 o'clock, it's actually stopped at 23:59!

subtitles.original: 1分前！
subtitles.english: 1 minute before!

subtitles.original: 魔法が解けないね！
subtitles.english: The magic won't wear off!

subtitles.original: 魔法が解けないんです。そうなんです。
subtitles.english: The magic doesn't wear off. That's right.

subtitles.original: そしてなんと今回ステージ、今日来てくれている皆さんのステージ、
subtitles.english: And incredibly, this time, the stage... for everyone who came today,

subtitles.original: 観客席がなんと三階席まである！
subtitles.english: there are even spectator seats up to the third level!

subtitles.original: やったー！すごい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Amazing!

subtitles.original: いや、すごい、すごい人ですよ、これはね。
subtitles.english: Wow, there are so many people here.

subtitles.original: おみんなのコールが聞こえる気がする。
subtitles.english: I feel like I can hear everyone's cheers.

subtitles.original: ということで、我々6周年を迎えましたので、改めてちょっと振り返ってとか、
subtitles.english: So, since we've reached our 6th anniversary, let's look back on things again,

subtitles.original: これから我々7年目に向けてでもいいんですけど、
subtitles.english: or talk about our upcoming 7th year,

subtitles.original: ライブの意気込みでもいいですし。
subtitles.english: or our enthusiasm for the live.

subtitles.original: 毎年周年来てるけど、もうそんなに経ったかーって。
subtitles.english: We have an anniversary every year, but I'm like, "Has it already been that long?"

subtitles.original: そうだね、ほんとに。
subtitles.english: That's true, really.

subtitles.original: はあちゃまある？
subtitles.english: Haachama, do you have something?

subtitles.original: いや、長いですね、7年目もね、やっぱり。
subtitles.english: It's been a long time. For the 7th year, too, as expected,

subtitles.original: アイドルらしく、最強アイドルとして頑張っていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I want to keep doing my best as the strongest idol!

subtitles.original: ではアキちゃん！
subtitles.english: Now, Aki-chan!

subtitles.original: まさか、7年も続けてこられるっていうのは想像もしてなかったけど、
subtitles.english: I never imagined that I'd be able to keep going for 7 years,

subtitles.original: でも今こうやってね、みんなと一緒にライブできるのはめちゃくちゃ嬉しい！
subtitles.english: but being able to perform a live with everyone like this now makes me so incredibly happy!

subtitles.original: 7年目もラッキーセブンにあやかっていっぱい頑張っていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: For the 7th year, I want to work hard and make the most of that "Lucky 7"!

subtitles.original: 今日はみんな王子様だからね。
subtitles.english: Since everyone is a prince today.

subtitles.original: まつりも7年目に向けて頑張るので、今年こそは王子様を見つけたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I'm also going to do my best for our 7th year, so I hope to finally find my prince this year!

subtitles.original: まつりすの中にいるかなー？
subtitles.english: I wonder if he's among the Matsuris?

subtitles.original: やめてください。
subtitles.english: Please stop that.

subtitles.original: そして、昨年頑張った我々は本当に...
subtitles.english: And for the 6th year, we really worked hard last year...

subtitles.original: 7年目でラッキーセブンで、いいこといっぱいあるといいなと思っております。
subtitles.english: I hope many good things happen in our 7th year, the "Lucky 7".

subtitles.original: それもこれも、今日来てくれている王子様の皆さんのおかげなので。
subtitles.english: And all of this is thanks to all the princes who came today.

subtitles.original: 王子様か、今日はおじ...
subtitles.english: Are they princes, or today, are they "oji"...

subtitles.original: おじさま！
subtitles.english: Old men!

subtitles.original: おじさま大歓迎！おじもいるのか。
subtitles.english: Old men are very welcome! Are there "oji" too?

subtitles.original: 今日見てくれている王子様たちのために、我々歌うので...
subtitles.english: Since we're going to sing for the princes watching today...

subtitles.original: さて、じゃあ次の曲に行きましょうかね。
subtitles.english: Well then, let's move on to the next song.

subtitles.original: 次は何だろう？え？なんかすごい音がした！
subtitles.english: What's next? Eh? I heard a strange sound!

subtitles.original: 何、何？痛い、頭痛い！なんか白身から出てきそう！
subtitles.english: What, what is it? It hurts, my head hurts! Something's coming out of the whites!

subtitles.original: プリにゃんモードはピピピのピ
subtitles.english: Prinyan Mode is Pipipi no Pi

subtitles.original: はにゃ～～ん！
subtitles.english: Hanyaan!

subtitles.original: 忘れちゃったのかにゃん？
subtitles.english: Did you forget about me-nyan?

subtitles.original: あたちが、ホワイトプリにゃんだにゃん！
subtitles.english: I am White Prinyan-nyan!

subtitles.original: 推しピのスマイルまで何マイル！？
subtitles.english: How many miles to my fave's smile!?

subtitles.original: 世界の果てまで狂わせて！
subtitles.english: Drive me crazy to the ends of the earth!

subtitles.original: ピピピ　ピピピ
subtitles.english: Pipipi Pipipi

subtitles.original: こっち向いて♡
subtitles.english: Look this way ♡

subtitles.original: ピピピ　ピピピ
subtitles.english: Pipipi Pipipi

subtitles.original: ハート作って♡
subtitles.english: Make a heart ♡

subtitles.original: ピピピ　ピピピ
subtitles.english: Pipipi Pipipi

subtitles.original: あんたが大将♡
subtitles.english: You're the boss ♡

subtitles.original: ピピピ　ピピピ
subtitles.english: Pipipi Pipipi

subtitles.original: 愛してる♡
subtitles.english: I love you ♡

subtitles.original: 神様助けて　また恋をしました
subtitles.english: God help me, I've fallen in love again

subtitles.original: （恋をしました）
subtitles.english: (I've fallen in love)

subtitles.original: 次こそは本当の　マジのラブなんだから
subtitles.english: Because next time is the real deal, it's serious love

subtitles.original: ホントだよー？
subtitles.english: I'm serious!

subtitles.original: ピピピ　ピピピ
subtitles.english: Pipipi Pipipi

subtitles.original: 合言葉ちょーだい♡
subtitles.english: Give me the password ♡
